ComicInfo.Summary: Everything has been leading to this issue— the nail-biting conclusion to the Turtles’ first fight with the Foot! Overwhelmed, outnumbered, injured, and running on fumes, the TMNT family is in for the battle of their lives. Will everyone survive? The end to the first year of IDW Turtles finishes big! Don’t miss it!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 00:28:04. [CVDB347306]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dan Duncan, John Rauch, Kevin Eastman, Ronda Pattison, Ryan Ottley
ComicInfo.Characters: Alopex, Angel, April O'Neil, Baxter Stockman, Casey Jones, Chun, Donatello, Hamato Yoshi, Karai, Krang, Leonardo, Link, Malo, Master Splinter, Michelangelo, Old Hob, Raphael, Sergeant Granitor, Shredder, Tang Shen, Traag
ComicInfo.Teams: Foot Clan, Purple Dragons, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
ComicInfo.Locations: Japan, New York City, New York State, Second Time Around
